description: Students pursue guided fieldwork experience in China and Japan.  Activities and readings in this
course build on the topics from ASCON 210 and three semesters of language study.  Students
continue to explore their understanding of Asia through language activities, site visits, and
ethnographic observations.  Students develop projects and follow a process of inquiry that will
understand how ordinary people construct "Asian" culture and society today. Offered annually
during Interim. Counts toward Asian studies, Chinese, and Japanese majors and Asian studies
